values: between the ages of my parents
the Round Table of King Arthur
the beginning of the following week
the first two or three days
the beginning of this last winter
the middle of the month of August
about a quarter of an hour
the beginning of the month of August of the same year
‘I am about to undertake that task
more than a century and a half
the last years of the nineteenth century
that night and the night after

13--HOW I FELL IN WITH THE CURATE

values: the small hours of Monday morning
a few minutes past nine that night
